title: How to use unique function in R with variable having "words in series
body:
New to R language and stackoverflow. I am working on a csv. file. I need to extract unique genres from the variable "Genre" in R. The content of the variable is

Genre Action, Thriller Drama, Romance Comedy, Drama Action, Thriller Comedy, Drama, Romance Comedy, Drama, Romance Crime, Drama, Thriller Comedy, Drama, Romance Drama, Romance Biography, Crime, Drama Drama Drama, Horror Drama, Romance Drama, Romance Horror

which goes on for more than 3000 in numbers

Can I get R codes for the said thing.
